unnormalised: Hey, these athlete bios are awesome! Just finished reading about Mithali Raj, what an inspiration! Remember "Chak De! India"? Similar vibe. Would love to see more on athletes from smaller towns, maybe someone from the National Sports University in Manipur?  Also, a deep dive into PT Usha's early struggles would be great. Keep 'em coming! This is more interesting than some Bollywood gossip! I even read about a local kabaddi player named Vijay who scored 15 Rs in one match.
